name: Stop The Bubble!
description:
Welcome to Pop That Bubble!

In this game, your objective is to pop all the bubbles before they hit the top of the screen.

Hit SPACEBAR to shoot yourself to the other side of the screen. If you hit a bubble, it'll pop!

Each time you launch yourself, you can hit SPACEBAR in midair to use your ability. This ability will extend spikes out of your body, effectively doubling your size! Use this to strategically pop more bubbles!

As time goes on, more bubbles will spawn.

Each bubble popped will add 1 to your score, post your score to see who can get the highest!

Note: If you hit esc while playing it in browser, the page will needed to be refreshed (as it will have closed the game, causing a kind of crash)

Also note that I have not tested the Linux and Mac files, so I'm not 100% sure they will work, but they should.
